TopicTitle: Trying to figure out what Mod this is !!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm new here so pardon if this is the wrong thread for this. 

I've been trying to figure out what ANNOYING mod this is.

Any help is appreciated !!!

https://ibb.co/SsNySxf
Which part are you referring to exactly?   I see a bunch of mods in there (but I assume you're referring to the part failure mod).

If you don't get any response I would do the following:

1) create folder on desktop and drag all the mods out of gamedata (you can leave ones you definitely know it isn't like KER and Squad).

2) fire up game and create a new game (don't use existing or they might break).

3) close game, add one mod back in and launch game to see if it was that.

4) rpt until you find the culprit.

(not familiar with the mod but I'm thinking it'll be that one with the heartbeat measurement)
The mods causing the failure are Kerbalism and KerbalismConfig. The Saturn V parts are from Bluedog Design Bureau, if that’s what annoying.

https://ibb.co/SsNySxf

 

Uh, a lot? Not sure what you want.

On 3/8/2021 at 3:28 PM, FruitGoose said:

If you don't get any response I would do the following:

1) create folder on desktop and drag all the mods out of gamedata (you can leave ones you definitely know it isn't like KER and Squad).

2) fire up game and create a new game (don't use existing or they might break).

3) close game, add one mod back in and launch game to see if it was that.

4) rpt until you find the culprit.

(not familiar with the mod but I'm thinking it'll be that one with the heartbeat measurement)

Or, you can save a lot of time, add half your mods back in, and the half again.  And so on.   Reduces the number of loads by a significant amount.
